name: PROBLEM_TREAT_SUMM_HNO_ID
description: Stores the problem ID and the note IDs of the treatment summary document linked to this problem.

columns.name: PROBLEM_LIST_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the problem record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: TX_SUM_HNO_ID
columns.description: The note ID of the treatment summary document linked to this problem.
